attributes.action: Cancel GCSE And A Levels Worldwide And Give Center Assessment Grades As In Wales
attributes.additional_details:
If You Think That Exams Are The Fairest Way To Give Grades To A Student, Then You Are Correct. But Due To The Pandemic We Lost Hours Of Study Time And Couldn't Have Face To Face Interaction With Teachers Who Could Have Made Us Understand Things Much Easily Which Couldn't Be Done In Online Classes.

It's My Urge To The Government And The Education Secretary To Think About The Situation Again And Give The Fairest Option Which Could Favor Millions Of Student's Lives.
attributes.background: Cancel GCSE, A Levels And As Levels Worldwide And Give Center Assessment Grades Which Is Being Given In Wales. COVID Cases Have Risen Ever Since Schools Opened.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
